p: Comparing the results with available literature, the rainy season was also favorable for the yield of oils Copaifera langsdorffii Desff ( Souza de Oliveira et al., 2017), Eucalyptus citriodora Hook ( Castro et al., 2008) and Cymbopogon citratus ( Santos et al., 2009). The presence of the major compounds as, γ-terpinene, terpinolene, τ-cadinol, p-cymene and linalool in the essential oil of the species under study, were also present in P. myrsinites Mart. ( Medeiros et al., 2015), Psidium pohlianum O. Berg, Psidium guyanensis Pers ( Neto et al., 1994) and Psidium caudatum McVaugh ( Yáñez et al., 2002).
